some of the tallest buildings in the world .
4 leaf clover but they are growing off the ground .
output.sentences: Gina loved the dandelions that grew on her property.
She loved the cheerful poppies that grew close to the rocks.
The only thing she didn't love was the pollution that floated by from the nearby factory.
So Gina planted some more plants to absorb the pollution.
Eventually she had an entire garden of beautiful, pollution fighting plants.
